<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//======----------- WindowScheduler.cpp - window scheduler -------------======//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An implementation of the Window Scheduling software pipelining algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The fundamental concept of the window scheduling algorithm involves folding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the original MBB at a specific position, followed by list scheduling on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// folded MIs. The optimal scheduling result is then chosen from various folding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// positions as the final scheduling outcome.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The primary challenge in this algorithm lies in generating the folded MIs and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// establishing their dependencies. We have innovatively employed a new MBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// created by copying the original MBB three times, known as TripleMBB. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TripleMBB enables the convenient implementation of MI folding and dependency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// establishment. To facilitate the algorithm&#39;s implementation, we have also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// devised data structures such as OriMIs, TriMIs, TriToOri, and OriToCycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Another challenge in the algorithm is the scheduling of phis. Semantically,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is difficult to place the phis in the window and perform list scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore, we schedule these phis separately after each list scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The provided implementation is designed for use before the Register Allocator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (RA). If the target requires implementation after RA, it is recommended to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reimplement analyseII(), schedulePhi(), and expand(). Additionally,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// target-specific logic can be added in initialize(), preProcess(), and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// postProcess().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lastly, it is worth mentioning that getSearchIndexes() is an important</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function. We have experimented with more complex heuristics on downstream</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// target and achieved favorable results.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/windowscheduler-h">llvm/CodeGen/WindowScheduler.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %1 = phi i32 &#91;%2, %BB.1&#93;, &#91;%7, %BB.3&#93;  (%1,%7)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %7 = add i32 %5, %6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ----------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %8 = sub i32 %7, %3                    (%1,%7),(%4,%8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %9 = add i32 %5, %6                    (%1,%7),(%4,%8),(%7,%9)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ----------------------------------</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %11 = add i32 %5, %6                   (%1,%7),(%4,%10),(%7,%11)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ==================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          &lt; Terminators &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ==================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DefPairs.count(NewUse))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">            NewUse = DefPairs&#91;NewUse&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">          NewMI-&gt;substituteRegister(DefRegPair.first, NewUse, 0, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a9301a41a35d6aa7367def5ea6fd78db7">TRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DefPairs is updated at last.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;NewDef : NewDefs)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DefPairs&#91;NewDef.first&#93; = NewDef.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a690d8e3b14e796b870f58d3d8f7e2a77">MBB</a>-&gt;push&#95;back(NewMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#afbe266c442e9313e05ebffb703c2bd36">TriMIs</a>.push&#95;back(NewMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a7e8c400b0b728b6ec230f0b487c6af44">TriToOri</a>&#91;NewMI&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 3: The registers used by phis are updated, and they are generated in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the third copy of MBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the privious example, the old phi is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %1 = phi i32 &#91;%2, %BB.1&#93;, &#91;%7, %BB.3&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new phi is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %1 = phi i32 &#91;%2, %BB.1&#93;, &#91;%11, %BB.3&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Phi : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a690d8e3b14e796b870f58d3d8f7e2a77">MBB</a>-&gt;phis()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefRegPair : DefPairs)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Phi.readsRegister(DefRegPair.first, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a9301a41a35d6aa7367def5ea6fd78db7">TRI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Phi.substituteRegister(DefRegPair.first, DefRegPair.second, 0, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a9301a41a35d6aa7367def5ea6fd78db7">TRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a94fa9430a250a99da03c75e55f605349">updateLiveIntervals</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After list scheduling, the MBB is restored in one traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#afbe266c442e9313e05ebffb703c2bd36">TriMIs</a>.size(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurPos = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getIterator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurPos != OldPos) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#af78f1d6e142343589981887d2a200d84"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#af78f1d6e142343589981887d2a200d84">WindowScheduler::getSearchIndexes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SearchNum,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SearchRatio) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use SearchRatio to get the index range, and then evenly get the indexes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// according to the SearchNum. This is a simple huristic. Depending on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// characteristics of the target, more complex algorithms can be used for both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// performance and compilation time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SearchRatio &lt;= 100 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;SearchRatio should be equal or less than 100!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad4542ab1cab20715a2bc58b001a42e4b">SchedInstrNum</a> &#42; SearchRatio / 100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Step = SearchNum &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; SearchNum &lt;= MaxIdx ? MaxIdx / SearchNum : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> SearchIndexes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0; Idx &lt; MaxIdx; Idx += Step)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SearchIndexes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(Idx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SearchIndexes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8b0679e70ea74a5f5f3a7fe8060a86e6"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8b0679e70ea74a5f5f3a7fe8060a86e6">WindowScheduler::getEstimatedII</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs">ScheduleDAGInstrs</a> &amp;DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sometimes MaxDepth is 0, so it should be limited to the minimum of 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxDepth = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SU : DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a3d5aacd5fc7d6a739ce913974ed1e53d">SUnits</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxDepth = std::max(SU.getDepth() + SU.Latency, MaxDepth);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxDepth &#42; WindowIICoeff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a5722fabe6420b0f87a3eb1160979e5f7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a5722fabe6420b0f87a3eb1160979e5f7">WindowScheduler::calculateMaxCycle</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs">ScheduleDAGInstrs</a> &amp;DAG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InitII = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8b0679e70ea74a5f5f3a7fe8060a86e6">getEstimatedII</a>(DAG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resourcemanager">ResourceManager</a> RM(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a99f029742c003f8a0e5db1538d07988e">Subtarget</a>, &amp;DAG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RM.init(InitII);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ResourceManager and DAG are used to calculate the maximum cycle for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scheduled MIs. Since MIs in the Region have already been scheduled, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// emit cycles can be estimated in order here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurCycle = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#adbdaac6e396c3d1dae6cee75cb2fee1f">getScheduleRange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad4542ab1cab20715a2bc58b001a42e4b">SchedInstrNum</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SU = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs/#ab75cd37a7a0319d5a4c77189cca106ec">getSUnit</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExpectCycle = CurCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The predecessors of current MI determine its earliest issue cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Pred : SU-&gt;Preds) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred.isWeak())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PredMI = Pred.getSUnit()-&gt;getInstr();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PredCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad0494bc6a8f8231640ccc225d7a86847">getOriCycle</a>(PredMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExpectCycle = std::max(ExpectCycle, PredCycle + (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)Pred.getLatency());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Zero cost instructions do not need to check resource.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad8a9c20c5c819e59cd32906f691fbc2c">TII</a>-&gt;isZeroCost(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ResourceManager can be used to detect resource conflicts between the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current MI and the previously inserted MIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RM.canReserveResources(&#42;SU, CurCycle) || CurCycle &lt; ExpectCycle) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++CurCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurCycle == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#aff75f05d43156623f0a46d6599927f6b">WindowIILimit</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RM.reserveResources(&#42;SU, CurCycle);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a54d52175d63bed9f3b0bd9f6317e023e">OriToCycle</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a09475eec526bdf8626b3a02adad1fa28">getOriMI</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)&#93; = CurCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\tCycle &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; CurCycle &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &#91;S.&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8f7e5d546027dc8ca8bb67c8b3f1b0cc">getOriStage</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a09475eec526bdf8626b3a02adad1fa28">getOriMI</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#93;: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MaxCycle is &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; CurCycle &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By utilizing TripleDAG, we can easily establish dependencies between A and B.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Based on the MaxCycle and the issue cycle of A and B, we can determine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// whether it is necessary to add a stall cycle. This is because, without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserting the stall cycle, the latency constraint between A and B cannot be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// satisfied. The details are as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// New MBB:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ========================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 &lt; Phis &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ========================================     (sliding direction)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MBB copy 1                                            |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                       V</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~|~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  ----schedule window-----</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    |                                  |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ===================V====================              |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MBB copy 2      &lt; MI B &gt;                              |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                       |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 &lt; MI A &gt;                              V</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  ------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ===================V====================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MBB copy 3      &lt; MI B&#39;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ========================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//              &lt; Terminators &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ========================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ae803ffd4decdd48471010ae2cb76d20d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ae803ffd4decdd48471010ae2cb76d20d">WindowScheduler::calculateStallCycle</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxCycle) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxStallCycle = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrentII = MaxCycle + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#adbdaac6e396c3d1dae6cee75cb2fee1f">getScheduleRange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad4542ab1cab20715a2bc58b001a42e4b">SchedInstrNum</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#aabfa4ddad621932351b720f8162030e8">TripleDAG</a>-&gt;getSUnit(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad0494bc6a8f8231640ccc225d7a86847">getOriCycle</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Succ : SU-&gt;Succs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Succ.isWeak() || Succ.getSUnit() == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#aabfa4ddad621932351b720f8162030e8">TripleDAG</a>-&gt;ExitSU)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the expected cycle does not exceed CurrentII, no check is needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DefCycle + (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)Succ.getLatency() &lt;= CurrentII)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the cycle of the scheduled MI A is less than that of the scheduled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MI B, the scheduling will fail because the lifetime of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// corresponding register exceeds II.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SuccMI = Succ.getSUnit()-&gt;getInstr();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad0494bc6a8f8231640ccc225d7a86847">getOriCycle</a>(SuccMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DefCycle &lt; UseCycle)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#aff75f05d43156623f0a46d6599927f6b">WindowIILimit</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the stall cycle introduced by the register between two trips.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StallCycle = DefCycle + (int)Succ.getLatency() - CurrentII - UseCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MaxStallCycle = std::max(MaxStallCycle, StallCycle);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MaxStallCycle is &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; MaxStallCycle &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxStallCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ac8c6acf329b4804c26c294903ae015de"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ac8c6acf329b4804c26c294903ae015de">WindowScheduler::analyseII</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledaginstrs">ScheduleDAGInstrs</a> &amp;DAG, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Start analyzing II:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a5722fabe6420b0f87a3eb1160979e5f7">calculateMaxCycle</a>(DAG, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxCycle == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#aff75f05d43156623f0a46d6599927f6b">WindowIILimit</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StallCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ae803ffd4decdd48471010ae2cb76d20d">calculateStallCycle</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, MaxCycle);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StallCycle == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)<a href="#aff75f05d43156623f0a46d6599927f6b">WindowIILimit</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StallCycle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value of II is equal to the maximum execution cycle plus 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxCycle + StallCycle + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ab595a02e4a2cbfc15add4253f222d3f1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ab595a02e4a2cbfc15add4253f222d3f1">WindowScheduler::schedulePhi</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Start scheduling Phis:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Phi : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a690d8e3b14e796b870f58d3d8f7e2a77">MBB</a>-&gt;phis()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LateCycle = INT&#95;MAX;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#aabfa4ddad621932351b720f8162030e8">TripleDAG</a>-&gt;getSUnit(&amp;Phi);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Succ : SU-&gt;Succs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phi doesn&#39;t have any Anti successors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Succ.getKind() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732af91df2221290eaa1a368403ffad49a26">SDep::Data</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phi is scheduled before the successor of stage 0 The issue cycle of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// phi is the latest cycle in this interval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SuccMI = Succ.getSUnit()-&gt;getInstr();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad0494bc6a8f8231640ccc225d7a86847">getOriCycle</a>(SuccMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8f7e5d546027dc8ca8bb67c8b3f1b0cc">getOriStage</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a09475eec526bdf8626b3a02adad1fa28">getOriMI</a>(SuccMI), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LateCycle = std::min(LateCycle, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60dc5ae8be8d73033ce099677e645b9b">Cycle</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The anti-dependency of phi need to be handled separately in the same way.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> AntiReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8d55f2013c2e95d424a903ff919e8fa5">getAntiRegister</a>(&amp;Phi)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;AntiMI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a588faf8e1f126dc258d357b045595407">MRI</a>-&gt;getVRegDef(AntiReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AntiReg may be defined outside the kernel MBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AntiMI-&gt;getParent() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a690d8e3b14e796b870f58d3d8f7e2a77">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AntiCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#ad0494bc6a8f8231640ccc225d7a86847">getOriCycle</a>(AntiMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a8f7e5d546027dc8ca8bb67c8b3f1b0cc">getOriStage</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/windowscheduler/#a09475eec526bdf8626b3a02adad1fa28">getOriMI</a>(AntiMI), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LateCycle = std::min(LateCycle, AntiCycle);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is no limit to the late cycle, a default value is given.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LateCycle == INT&#95;MAX)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LateCycle = (int)(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> - 1);</span></CodeLine>
